refnamediv.refpurpose: Read or receive a buffer from an USB HID Device with timeout

varlistentry.listitem: : Buffer to be read or transfer to the USB HID Device. The type of the data in the buffer has to be unsigned integer of 8 bits
: Size of the buffer to be read into the USB HID Device. The type of _size has to be unsigned integer of 8 bits
: milliseconds timeout in milliseconds or -1 for blocking wait. The type of _size has to be integer of 32 bits
: retun 0 if device has been read and -1 if the device can not be read. Check the USB HID device is properly connected to the host computer and properly opened.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Read the data buffer sent by the USB HID Device
Keep in mind that USB 2.0 and older are a master/slave protocol. The USB device will send data only if the master (the host, its mean the computer), asked for it.
